name: Frozen Prickly Pear Margarita
description: Frozen Prickly pear margarita, a refreshing way to cool down this summer.

video.name: Frozen Prickly Pear Margarita
video.description: Frozen Prickly Pear Margarita , step by step instructions on how to peel a prickly pear and turn it into a margarita

recipeInstructions.text: Blend prickly pears on low for 60 seconds. Then blend on high for 30 seconds. Strain. Set liquid aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend prickly pears on low for 60 seconds. Then blend on high for 30 seconds. Strain. Set liquid aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour tequila, Cointreau, lime juice, and prickly pear juice in blender. Add ice and blend on high.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour tequila, Cointreau, lime juice, and prickly pear juice in blender. Add ice and blend on high.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in two salt rimmed glasses.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve in two salt rimmed glasses.
